member.summary: The internal player

member.name: M:Alis.Core.Audio.OS.Player.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class
member.exception: No implementation exist for the current OS

member.name: E:Alis.Core.Audio.OS.Player.PlaybackFinished
member.summary: Internally, sets Playing flag to false. Additional handlers can be attached to it to handle any custom logic.

member.name: P:Alis.Core.Audio.OS.Player.Playing
member.summary: Indicates that the audio is currently playing.

member.name: P:Alis.Core.Audio.OS.Player.Paused
member.summary: Indicates that the audio playback is currently paused.

member.name: M:Alis.Core.Audio.OS.Player.Play(System.String)
member.summary: Will stop any current playback and will start playing the specified audio file. The fileName parameter can be an absolute path or a path relative to the directory where the library is located. Sets Playing flag to true. Sets Paused flag to false.

member.name: M:Alis.Core.Audio.OS.Player.Pause
member.summary: Pauses any ongong playback. Sets Paused flag to true. Doesn't modify Playing flag.

member.name: M:Alis.Core.Audio.OS.Player.Resume
member.summary: Resumes any paused playback. Sets Paused flag to false. Doesn't modify Playing flag.

member.name: M:Alis.Core.Audio.OS.Player.Stop
member.summary: Stops any current playback and clears the buffer. Sets Playing and Paused flags to false.

member.name: M:Alis.Core.Audio.OS.Player.SetVolume(System.Byte)
member.summary: Sets the playing volume as percent

member.name: M:Alis.Core.Audio.OS.Player.OnPlaybackFinished(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Ons the playback finished using the specified sender
